page.title: 07St Michael's Church
page.content: The church is over 800 years old and there have been 72 rectors! Mr. Vousden is rector now. I liked the stained glass windows, one is Norman. There are six bells and Cuxton ringers meet every week to practise. We rang a real bell. There are 22 people in the choir, about 100 attend on Sunday mornings. Twenty four children go to the Sunday School but there is another one at the village chapel. Six couples were married here in the last 4 weeks. Mr. Vousden holds 12 services a week. At the end of the 800th anniversary week on July 7th lots of people came to the Sunday service. Our M.P. came too. Some had to sit outside. Some children from our school played recorders and read poems. The Bishop preached and we all had a picnic lunch on the grass outside.
